Question: Suzhou Handy Audio-Visual Technology Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Suzhou Handy Audio-Visual Technology Co., Ltd

Product Highlights at CES 2024

- Fixed LCD TV Desktop Stand VK001GL-400 II
- Full Motion Super Thin TV Wall Mount JT11L01L
- Full Motion TV Wall Mount JT10L01L
- Full Motion Wall Mount Extra Extension JT07K01L
- High Grade Aluminum TV Cart HDCM001-5
- High Quality Upright TV Stand HDSM006R
- TV Ceiling Mount VG003W-AL600

Suzhou Handy Audio-Visual Technology Co., Ltd, with 20 years of experience, offers a range of TV brackets, mounts, and modern office furniture. Their products are sold globally, characterized by high-end quality and competitive pricing. The company is also focused on inventing pneumatic systems and motor-adjustable modern office furniture to cater to the trend of standing offices.
Summary_cn:
苏州汉迪视听科技有限公司

2024国际消费电子展（CES）亮点产品

- 固定式LCD电视台式支架 VK001GL-400 II
- 全动超薄电视挂架 JT11L01L
- 全动电视挂架 JT10L01L
- 全动墙壁挂架增加延伸 JT07K01L
- 高档铝制电视车 HDCM001-5
- 高品质立式电视支架 HDSM006R
- 电视天花板安装支架 VG003W-AL600

具有20年经验的苏州汉迪视听科技有限公司提供多种电视支架、挂架和现代办公家具。其产品以高端质量和有竞争力的价格在全球销售。该公司还专注于发明气动系统和电动可调节的现代办公家具，以满足站立办公的趋势。
